short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Looks for SQL Statements and adds a 'Find SQL in DBmarlin' button

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The DBmarlin SQL Search extension adds a 'Find SQL in DBmarlin' button into the UI of other products containing SQL statements.

List of supported products:
- Instana SaaS
- New Relic SaaS
- Splunk Observability SaaS
- Self-hosted versions of supported products
- More coming soon
